name: Konstrukt™ Trafficshield™
subtitle: K-406 Rapid Cure Self Leveling Underlayment Compound

info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: Konstrukt™ Trafficshield™ K-406 Rapid Cure Self Leveling Underlayment Compound is a product used to level minor substrate unevenness before the placement of various coverings such as ceramic tiles, natural stones and marbles, wood, and carpets.

info.title: MATERIAL PREPARATION
info.body: Put the 20-kg of K-406 Rapid Cure Self Leveling Underlayment Compound into a suitable container (like a plastic bucket). Using a drill mixer, mix the product with 4.4 to 4.8 Liters of water until a lump-free homogenous paste is reached.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.body: Check and repair all relevant defects by consulting necessary civil works. Make sure that the surface is clean and dry, free from dirt and oil prior to the application of the product. Apply a layer of K-402 Concrete Leveling Bond Coat.

info.title: APPLICATION SCHEDULE
info.body:
Pour out the mixture onto the properly sealed substrate and distribute it evenly with a smoothening trowel or a screed rake.
Use a spiked roller to eliminate foams in the application.
The mixture should be used within 20-30 minutes after mixing. Avoid the addition of water into mixture that has begun to set.
Wait for approximately 24 to 48 hours for the product to dry before placing various coverings on top of it.
